   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(nested_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   24:          case_in_case/1, case_in_after/1, catch_in_catch/1, bif_in_bif/1]).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: suite() ->
   29:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   30:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   31: 
   32: all() -> 
   33:     [case_in_case, case_in_after, catch_in_catch,
   34:      bif_in_bif].
   35: 
   36: 
   37: case_in_case(suite) -> [];
   38: case_in_case(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   39:     done = search_any([a], [{a, 1}]),
   40:     done = search_any([x], [{a, 1}]),
   41:     ok.
   42: 
   43: search_any([Key|Rest], List) ->
   44:     case case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, List) of
   45:              {value, _} -> 
   46:                  true;
   47:              _ ->
   48:                  false
   49:          end of
   50:         true ->
   51:             ok;
   52:         false ->
   53:             error;
   54:         Other ->
   55:             ct:fail({other_result, Other})
   56:     end,
   57:     search_any(Rest, List);
   58: search_any([], _) ->
   59:     done.
   60: 
   61: case_in_after(suite) -> [];
   62: case_in_after(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   63:     receive
   64:     after case {x, y, z} of
   65:               {x, y, z} -> 0
   66:           end ->
   67:               ok
   68:     end,
   69:     ok.
   70: 
   71: %% Test a catch within a catch in the same function.
   72: catch_in_catch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   73:     {outer, inner_exit} = catcher(),
   74:     ok.
   75: 
   76: catcher() ->
   77:     case (catch 
   78:           case (catch ?MODULE:non_existing()) of    % bogus function
   79:               {'EXIT', _} ->
   80:                   inner_exit;
   81:               Res1 ->
   82:                   {inner, Res1}
   83:           end) of
   84:         {'EXIT', _} ->
   85:             outer_exit;
   86:         Res2 ->
   87:             {outer, Res2}
   88:     end.
   89: 
   90: %% Test a BIF call within a BIF call.
   91: bif_in_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   92:     Self = self(),
   93:     put(pid, Self),
   94:     Self = register_me(),
   95:     ok.
   96: 
   97: register_me() ->
   98:     register(?MODULE, Pid = get(pid)),
   99:     Pid.
